caption.title: Leakage of 260 nm-absorbing material from 3.2x10 7 cells of Burkholderia cenocepacia strain LMG 16656 when exposed to terpinen-4-ol (0.25%v/v) and geraniol (0.5%v/v).
caption.p: Values shown are normalised to the total material released by heat treatment and means of three replicates; error bars show standard deviation.
